biography.bio: Nicole Chomo is an actress, known for Cyrano de Bergerac (1990), The Lacemaker (1977) and Les filles de Malemort (1974).
biography.name: Nicole Chomo

biography.bio: Christian Duroc is known for his work on Les filles de Malemort (1974), Line Up and Lay Down (1973) and L'évasion de Hassan Terro (1976).
biography.name: Christian Duroc

biography.bio: Pierre Forget was born on January 29, 1929 in Imphy, Nièvre, France. He was an actor, known for Three Colors: Blue (1993), L'homme qui voulait savoir (1988) and Marche à l'ombre (1984). He died on August 26, 1993 in Clamart, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Pierre Forget

biography.bio: François Guillaume was born on June 24, 1947 in Mende, Lozère, France. He is known for his work on Heavy Rain (2010), The Man in the Iron Mask (1977) and Exorcisme (1975).
biography.name: François Guillaume

biography.bio: Attempted to make a career as an actress (her frail charm, porcelain skin and wide eyes were mostly seen in films by Jean-Charles Tacchella), before her sister, journalist Françoise Laborde, helped her make her way through French TV channel TF1. Catherine Laborde now works as a weather report presenter, presenting the most watched weather report in France, at 8:45 pm, just after the main evening news.
biography.name: Catherine Laborde

biography.bio: Marielle Ollivier is an actress, known for Sensuous Doll (1973), Les filles de Malemort (1974) and The Insolent (1973).
biography.name: Marielle Ollivier

biography.bio: Marie Hélène Règne is an actress, known for Les petites saintes y touchent (1974), The Bitches (1973) and Les confidences érotiques d'un lit trop accueillant (1973).
biography.name: Marie Hélène Règne

biography.bio: Catherine Rouchon is an actress, known for La belle verte (1996), Les filles de Malemort (1974) and Krank.
biography.name: Catherine Rouchon

biography.bio: Gilda Arancio is an actress, known for Zombie Lake (1981), Swedish Sex Games (1975) and Kiss Me Killer (1977).
biography.name: Gilda Arancio

biography.bio: Christian Baltauss is an actor, known for Le dernier métro (1980), The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie (1972) and The Lacemaker (1977).
biography.name: Christian Baltauss

biography.bio: Claudia Coste is an actress, known for Tir à vue (1984) and Les filles de Malemort (1974).
biography.name: Claudia Coste

biography.bio: Jerry Di Giacomo is an actor, known for Immortel (ad vitam) (2004), Arthur and the Invisibles (2006) and Leftover (2015).
biography.name: Jerry Di Giacomo

biography.bio: Anne Dolans is an actress and producer, known for L'amour c'est du papier (1973), Un amour de sable (1977) and Chap'la (1980).
biography.name: Anne Dolans

biography.bio: Michel Blanc was born on April 16, 1952 in Courbevoie, Seine [now Hauts-de-Seine], France. He is an actor and writer, known for The Monster (1994), Monsieur Hire (1989) and Marche à l'ombre (1984).
biography.name: Michel Blanc

biography.bio: Edith Ker is an actress, known for Delicatessen (1991), Madame Ex (1977) and La pomme de son oeil (1970).
biography.name: Edith Ker
